item.title: Projects
item.description: Here’s my master thesis [italian] and my GitHub page. Sometimes I say something on Medium. A simple chat app based on Web Sockets. See here Pair programming .vscode extension IDE extension to support pair programming. See here Some projects I did during my studies: A 3D Blender rendering for the computer graphic course using ray tracing effect. A JBoss app using Opennebula tool (2014).

item.title: Read it!
item.description: Here’s a list of interesting books/articles/stuff I’ve read and I recommend! The Pragmatic Programmer: From Journeyman to Master (eg. on Amazon) How To Write Unmaintainable Code article Building Maintainable Software book. Here‘s my book review on Medium.
